players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of the more suspicious players? That seems odd."
You: "I investigated Charlie because I had a hunch, and it paid off. Diana, are you trying to defend the mafioso?"
Diana: "I am not defending anyone. Bob, your claim is convenient but unverified. Why should we trust you without proof? We need more discussion before voting."

Charlie: "Bob, you're clearly lying about being the detective. A real detective wouldn't reveal themselves so early with 3 players left. You're either mafia trying to frame me, or a villager making a desperate play."
